name: A. Jellyfish and Undertale
statement:
Flowey has planted a bomb in Snowdin!The bomb has a timer that is
initially set to b. Every second, the timer will decrease by 1. When the
timer reaches 0, the bomb will explode! To give the residents of Snowdin
enough time to evacuate, you will need to delay the bomb from exploding
for as long as possible.You have n tools. Each tool can only be used
once. If you use the i-th tool, the timer will increase by x_i. However,
if the timer is changed to an integer larger than a, the timer will be
set to a due to a bug.More specifically, the following events will
happen every second in the following order: You will choose some
(possibly none) of your tools that have not been used before. If you
choose the i-th tool, and the bomb’s timer is currently set to c, the
timer will be changed to
min(c + x_i, a). The timer decreases by 1. If the timer reaches 0, the
bomb explodes. Jellyfish now wants to know the maximum time in seconds
until the bomb explodes if the tools are used optimally.
